Edited July 13, 2020 by Well

Knes 1.8.2 is online (Fix Update + 2 new little part) 

Knes 1.8.2 [2020-07-16]

- Fix P120 booster fairing inverted normals
- New P40 1.25 boosters for diogene 2 launcher
- New Snecma "Avroom" Avionics
- Craft Files Updates
- Reduced Fuel in H8 & H10 FuelTank
- Reduced size of Adapter collider, to not block Fairing
- Adjust Diamant Engine isp
- Adjust Carmen Engine isp Diane/Mireille
- Global Review of Engine Mass (Reduced)
- P064 have now 30 solid fuel

Knes 1.8.2 on GitHub

Big news linked to this update, is the  Unofficial Knes Wiki !

Made and Managed by @tony48 with the Help of @MaguKerman and  @CapC0m

Many thanks to them for all the work they have put on this Wiki, don't forget to thanks them for all this work

This let you know how to use most of the Parts included in the mod, and that also a nice way to see if this mod is for you.

(All parts are not showed on the wiki, but most of them)

Edited July 16, 2020 by Well

 Beat me to it!  Nice work!

Congratulation for Wiki!

 

More ATV update screenshot:

Spoiler

Unity a space Station operated by ESA, JAXA and CSA in a alternate Universe where NASA discard ISS in 2016 in profit of Constellation Program. Russian kept their module. Columbus and Kiro were dock to a "parking" ATV temporarily during new station development.

 

JAXA and ESA decide to build a new Station around this base to reduce cost. A power module was added to maintain life support in 2009 for spationaute and  Japanese astronaute. A docking adapter was added for permit docking of JAXA spacecraft.

 

 

5 years later in 2014, ESA Starwatcher and JAXA Fuji become operational and the new named UNITY station host his first Crew.

 

In 2015, the station core module is added, it's 3 node docking port permit more module to be added and will the base of a bigger truss section for power generation. He is equip with two powerful engine to change it's orbit inclinaison (minus 12°)  to negate risque of collision with Russion section of ISS ( let call it MIR II). The canadian Space Agency begin to show interest to join the project. Discussion around a Canadian module begin.

 

 

The first parts of truss section are installed three month later,  CSA, ESA and JAXA agree to a ESA/CSA co-financed module and cupola, CSA will finance the second module.

 

In 2017 and 2018 CSA module are added, more powered truss section are added.

 

StarWatcher docking to Unity in 2019.

 

In 2020, studies are on the way to add another node for more module. Unity will also be visited by a Crew Lunar Transport System to test it's system in a long space exposure.

It can be a alternate Timeline where NASA decide to do freedom station alone, Buran come into full Service and ESA decide to join MIR II program for a rapprochement following the democratization of URSS in 90s.

Is it possible to install this mod with CKAN?

1 hour ago, flyingfisch said:

Is it possible to install this mod with CKAN?

1.  CKAN Issues belong in the CKAN thread.

2.  Well has stated he would prefer this mod stay off of CKAN because

3.  CKAN tends to introduce bugs that manual installation would avoid.

3 hours ago, MashAndBangers said:

1.  CKAN Issues belong in the CKAN thread.

2.  Well has stated he would prefer this mod stay off of CKAN because

3.  CKAN tends to introduce bugs that manual installation would avoid.

Thanks for the explanation!

CKAN tends to


avoid bugs users would introduce

FTFY.

Please don't spread unfounded FUD. For every broken install "caused" by CKAN, I bet you there are at least ten caused by inexperienced users that could have been avoided by using a package management system.
